attributes.action: Recognise the fact that low voter turnout is not voter apathy but alienation at the inadequacy of the political parties to represent the British Public
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current political party leaderships and the adversarial party system in this country has degenerated into completely insular cheap political point scoring and in-fighting that takes no heed of the wants, needs or interests of the British Public.
We petition the Prime Minister and the leading political figures to climb down from their ivory towers and re-engage with the voting public that they erroneously claim to represent and bear responsibility to.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
